title: Structural Capital Utilization and PLN Strategies in University Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic concepts in organizational learning and network building
context.additional_context: Corporate in-service training program aimed at strengthening organizational learning capabilities in language education

learning_goals: Learners can design an organizational knowledge-sharing system by building a Personal Learning Network (PLN).
Learners can analyze the impact of structural capital on organizational learning outcomes.
Learners can execute and evaluate PLN operation scenarios using VR simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
